Articles.Content:
Hi

Is there a way to force vessels, etc to load because I have the Kethane mod installed and unless your flying the vessel it wont map the planet.

thanks

Have you tryed Karbonite and use ScanSat to scan IMO much better.

EDIT- And at one time thought ScanSat was going to scan for Kethane too but don't know what happen there.
no, I just saw Kethane under required mods for MKS
Kethane is not required for MKS where did you get that or am, I missing something ?
My mistake, I was looking at the old thread
